description:
Purpose: To provision a VM & SG in AWS by specifying Image Id, Flavor, KeyPair, Security Group Rules & Password for the VM. This uses AWS CFN Template Format. The Image ID (AMI) is chosen based on the region in which the stack is run. 

Inputs Required: Keypair Name, Instance Type & SSH Location. 

Use case(s): Auto-Scaling, Other cases where VM is to be created on a schedule/demand.
name: AWS_Provision_VM_and_SG
